snippet: The Dow industrials closed at the highest point since 2008, and the Nasdaq composite regained a level last seen in 2000.
abstract: Strong monthly jobs market report sends stocks surging; Dow Jones industrial average closes at its highest point since 2008.
lead_paragraph: The Dow industrials closed at the highest point since 2008, and the Nasdaq composite regained a level last seen in 2000.

headline.seo: U.S. Jobs Report Gives Stocks a Lift
headline.main: 3-Year High for the Dow as Wall St. Cheers Data
headline.print_headline: 3-Year High For the Dow As Wall St. Cheers Data
